typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> streamoutput1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Product
streamoutput1, Product lookup(streamoutput1@Column_1 == Product@Column_1,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sort(asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true)) ~> Sort1
